content:

author: carlbeek
content:
Without knowing a little more about what you'd like to know/dig into it's a little hard to know what you are after. Are you wanting to understand the protocol or do you want to understand more the the ecosystem that its built on top?

The Ethereum.org website has a surprising amount of info on many topics and is a good starting point for most people: https://ethereum.org/en/learn/
